meanings.sent1: The cake was reprocessed to make it fresher.
meanings.sent2: The data was reprocessed for accuracy.
meanings.sent3: The joke was reprocessed so many times that it lost its humor.
meanings.sent4: Her words echoed in his mind, reprocessed and distorted.
meanings.sent5: The old book was reprocessed into a new story, captivating readers.

meanings.definition: Subjected to a further process or treatment
meanings.sent1: The reprocessed fabric felt softer than before.
meanings.sent2: The reprocessed metal had a shiny finish.
meanings.sent3: The reprocessed vegetables looked more vibrant on the plate.
meanings.sent4: Her reprocessed hair gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The reprocessed paper had a smooth texture, perfect for writing.
